name: Destruction!
description:
Little game based on the destruction of the death star submitted for the Movie Game Jam!

Controls are "W/A/S/D" to move "Space bar" to shoot and "T" to make the tie-fighter shoot if you want. Put the game in fullscreen mode to play!

I hope you like it!!

Gamedev: Addison

PixelArt: Addison

Music: Eric Skiff
